bug.author: Faizan-Pirhoalpha
bug.description: I try to run the <denchmark-link:https://colab.research.google.com/github/NVIDIA/NeMo/blob/r1.0.0b3/tutorials/asr/Offline_ASR.ipynb#scrollTo=8qgXHl78WneK>offline colab notebook</denchmark-link> . Without changing anything I run cells and get error while running this line Error: <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/76702393/104902439-c2a47b00-59a4-11eb-99c4-9e54e1e93b14.png></denchmark-link>

comments.comment: You don't need the decoder.params.vocabulary anymore. Directly use decoder.vocabulary
Yes this solves the issue thanks
